articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Want to follow along with the Ethereum community? The Ethereum Foundation will host a livestream tonight.
articles.title: The Ethereum Merge Is Tonight—Here’s How to Watch Live

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: With less than 24 hours to go until the scheduled merge event, the price of Ethereum is largely trading sideways.
articles.title: Ethereum Price Flat as Merge Event Is Hours Away

articles.author: Emily Tonelli
articles.description: Despite attempts to secure fresh funding and pivot to new targets, NFT renting platform Rentable is today shuttering operations.
articles.title: NFT Renting Platform Shuts Down, Citing 'Close to Zero Traction'

articles.description: The Ethereum merge will happen this week. In this serving of Decrypt-O's, Kate Irwin explains the Bellatrix upgrade and the shadow fork, Dan Roberts predicts the impact Ethereum's move to proof of stake will have on Bitcoin's energy use PR problem (plus commentary from Dan Held from the gm podcast), and Sander Lutz hits the street in Hollyweird to ask regular folks if they know and care about the merge. (Production by Zack Edelman, editing by Jason Nelson.)
articles.title: Decrypt-O's Ep. 2: Who Cares About the Ethereum Merge?

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: Works by Picasso, Bacon, Rousseau and Renoir will be auctioned off to expand the museum’s digital presence, including the possible purchase of NFTs.
articles.title: $70M Art Collection at MoMA To Be Sold, Proceeds Could Fund NFT Buys

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: The price of Bitcoin has dropped by around 9% in the past 24 hours, once again wiping out most of its recent gains.
articles.title: Bitcoin Tumbles 9% On The Day Amid Inflation Fears

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: South Korean court has issued an arrest warrant for Do Kwon, a co-founder of Terra, accusing him of violating capital market rules.
articles.title: South Korean Authorities Issue Arrest Warrant for Terra Co-Founder Do Kwon

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: The “Future of NFTs” panel at SALT offered a sobering look at the NFT bear market and the Ethereum Merge.
articles.title: ‘WAGMI’ Is Dead: Pplpleasr, UnicornDAO, TIME President Weigh in on NFTs

articles.author: John Rudden
articles.description: The crypto lender looks to build its vault collateral while moving away from centralized stablecoins.
articles.title: Maker Raises Staked Ethereum Limit to Reduce Reliance on USDC

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Ethereum is set to transition to proof of stake, which means the biggest network for NFTs will become environmentally friendly.
articles.title: How the Ethereum Merge Ends the Environmental Debate About NFTs

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: Dissemination of the mixing tool’s open source code is also legal, regulators say.
articles.title: Treasury Won’t Punish Dusted Celebs, Will Allow Users to Recover Funds From Tornado Cash

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Sales are skyrocketing after Reddit co-founder Alexis Ohanian led a funding round in the Pharrell Williams-backed NFT project.
articles.title: Doodles Ethereum NFT Sales Surge 1,200% After Big Raise Values Project at $704M

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: Pierre Poilievre recently won the Conservative Party leadership, and Canadian Prime Minister Trudeau is wasting no time taking aim at his opponent's position on Bitcoin.
articles.title: Justin Trudeau Slams Conservative Rival’s 'Irresponsible' Bitcoin Views

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The digital asset custodian wants Galaxy Digital to pay up after terminating its planned purchase.
articles.title: BitGo Sues Novogratz’s Galaxy Digital for $100M After Scrapped Acquisition

articles.description: EDX Markets plans to offer “safer, faster and more efficient cryptocurrency trading.”
articles.title: Charles Schwab, Citadel and Fidelity Launch EDX Crypto Exchange

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: The Linux Foundation's initiative aims to open-source digital wallet development, including those that would use cryptocurrencies.
articles.title: Linux Foundation's Announces Open-Source Digital Wallet Initiative, May Include Crypto

articles.author: Tom Farren
articles.description: The Doodles NFT project has now hit a $704 million valuation following the latest fundraise.
articles.title: Reddit's Ohanian, FTX Ventures Join $54M Raise in NFT Project Doodles

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: Bitcoin and Ethereum both slumped after the U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics released its latest CPI figures.
articles.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Drop 5% in an Hour Amid Hot US Inflation Figures

articles.description: Slice’s browser extension has implemented Zebedee’s tech to pay users BTC for viewing ads.
articles.title: You Can Now Earn Bitcoin By Surfing the Web on Chrome, Brave, and More

articles.description: Ubisoft faced backlash for adding NFTs to Ghost Recon Breakpoint, but CEO Yves Guillemot says the company is still refining its Web3 pivot.
articles.title: ‘Still in Research Mode’ With Web3, NFTs Says Ubisoft CEO Yves Guillemot

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Opera has rolled out a major upgrade of its Web3-centric web browser, adding a slate of new features.
articles.title: Opera Crypto Browser Integrates MetaMask Ahead of Ethereum Merge

articles.author: Emily Tonelli
articles.description: With an expected launch date in the U.S. slated for Q1 2023, Abra Bank will soon offer trading, custody, and NFT services to Americans.
articles.title: Abra to Launch US Chartered Bank, Crypto Yield Accounts

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Heather “Razzlekhan” Morgan, an individual with alleged ties to the 2016 Bitfinex hack, has requested access to her crypto for tax purposes.
articles.title: Alleged Bitcoin Launderer 'Razzlekhan' Wants Access to Crypto Wallets for Tax Purposes

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: With the Helium community eyeing a merge of its operations to Solana, SOL has jumped around 7% over the past 24 hours.
articles.title: Solana Jumps 7% as Crypto 'Hotspot' Project Helium Eyes Merge

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The proof-of-work blockchain looks to continue the Ethereum legacy of profitable mining.
articles.title: Ethereum Fork EthereumPoW Announces Post-Merge Launch Plans

articles.description: Terra has lost steam after last week’s sudden surge, but both LUNA and LUNA Classic are still way up in price over the last week.
articles.title: Terra Falls Back Down to Earth: LUNA Sinks 38% From Recent High

articles.description: Teased by Galaxy Digital CEO Mike Novogratz, the wealth management giant is mulling a deeper dive into crypto.

articles.description: The flurry of activity comes as FTX announces a new RVN futures offering.
articles.title: Ethereum Mining Alternative Ravencoin Jumps 85% Ahead of the Merge

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Former Coinbase staffer Ishan Wahi previously pled not guilty, but his brother appears to have told a different story.
articles.title: Ex-Coinbase Product Manager's Brother Pleads Guilty in Crypto Insider Trading Case

articles.description: Universal Music Group’s Kingship just recruited a couple of massive hitmakers in the form of Hit-Boy and James Fauntleroy.
articles.title: Bored Ape NFT Metaverse Band Taps Beyoncé, Bruno Mars Producers

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: The merge will make Ethereum more energy efficient, and Bank of America researchers say this could increase interest from institutions.
articles.title: Ethereum Merge Could Drive Up Institutional Adoption: Bank of America

articles.author: John Rudden
articles.description: In order to meet surging interest in Ethereum derivatives, CME Group is rolling out an options product for the number two cryptocurrency.
articles.title: Leading Derivatives Exchange CME Group Launches Ethereum Options

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: Seychelles-based crypto exchange Huobi plans to delist seven privacy-centric cryptocurrencies, including Monero and Zcash.
articles.title: Crypto Exchange Huobi to Delist 7 Privacy Coins, Citing ‘Latest Financial Regulations’

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The coffee giant plans to both give out and sell digital stamps that can unlock perks like exclusive merch, private events, and trips.
articles.title: Starbucks Taps Ethereum Scaling Network Polygon for NFT Rewards

articles.author: Ben Munster
articles.description: The heavyweight CEO of crypto exchange FTX Sam Bankman-Fried also struck a balanced perspective on the debate over regulatory oversight.
articles.title: 'Everything's Down This Year': FTX Founder SBF

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: As Tron’s official market maker, Wintermute will be responsible for creating liquid TRX markets and supporting the network’s DeFi activity.
articles.title: Tron Taps Crypto Market Maker Wintermute to Become Official Partner

articles.description: The Ethereum Merge to Proof of Stake (PoS) is one of the most significant technological upgrades in recent history. But why evolve Ethereum at all? Learn the difference between PoW and PoS, why PoS will decrease Ethereum’s carbon footprint by 99.95%, and more in the Infura Web3 Dev Series: The Merge Explained. Author: Clarissa Watson, Senior Tech Writer at ConsenSys.
articles.title: Decrypt Learn: The Ethereum Merge

articles.author: Emily Tonelli
articles.description: WazirX announced that it has had its previously-frozen assets released following “active cooperation” with local authorities.
articles.title: Crypto Exchange WazirX Sees Assets Unfrozen Amid Indian Regulator’s Investigation

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: The $35 million hole in the form of the stablecoin USDC is claimed to be less than 3% of the Algorand Foundation’s assets.
articles.title: Algorand Foundation Seeks 'Legal Remedies' to Reclaim $35M Hodlnaut Deposit

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: Bitcoin and Ethereum have enjoyed a hefty boost this last week, with regulatory news and a particular network upgrade playing key roles.
articles.title: Double-Digit Weekly Gains for Bitcoin and Ethereum Send BTC Over $22,000

articles.author: Daniel Roberts
articles.description: All eyes in crypto are on the merge—and not just the Ethereum crowd. The event matters for Bitcoiners and everyone else.
articles.title: The Ethereum Merge Matters for Everyone in Crypto

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: The renown Bitcoiner believes some of the top coin's advocates have strayed away from the network's ethos.
articles.title: ‘Fire and Brimstone’ Bitcoin Maxis Are Being Unrealistic: Dan Held

articles.description: The years-anticipated Ethereum Merge is less than a week away. Everyone is buzzing about what it will mean for the crypto market and for proof of work vs proof of stake, but what will the effect be on NFTs? Dan Roberts, Andrew Hayward, Kate Irwin and Sander Lutz break it down in our latest live roundtable.
articles.title: #DecryptLIVE: What the Ethereum Merge Means for NFTs

articles.description: Eat your Decrypt-O’s! In the debut episode, Sander Lutz hits the street to ask people about their privacy concerns in the wake of the government’s Tornado Cash crackdown; Kate Irwin shares headlines on the wackiest Web3 stories, from Crypto.com sending a woman $10 million by accident to Eminem and Snoop Dogg getting Twitter hate for their Bored Apes; and Dan Roberts serves up a rant about Gary Gensler. (Production and editing by Zack Edelman.)
articles.title: Decrypt-O's Ep. 1: Tornado Cash Privacy Fears, Bored Ape VMAs Hate, Sheriff Gensler

articles.description: Dan Held is an old-school Bitcoiner who has been in the space since the very beginning; he sold his price app ZeroBlock to Blockchain.info in 2013. But while he's largely seen as a Bitcoin maximalist by his half a million fans on Twitter, he tells Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott he's a "permissive" and "open-minded" Bitcoiner: he's watching the Ethereum Merge closely, and he admits Ethereum's move to proof of stake will put pressure on Bitcoin's energy use. Watch Episode 18 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: gm: Bitcoiner Dan Held Talks Ethereum Merge, PoW vs PoS, and NFTs

articles.description: Decrypt’s Dan Roberts, Stacy Elliott, Jason Nelson, and Sander Lutz break down all the angles, from the timing to the expected market reaction to the technical elements.
articles.title: #DecryptLIVE: Ethereum Merge Is on the Horizon

articles.description: Baek Kim of Hashed, Grace Isford of Lux Capital, Sarah Kunst of Cleo Capital, Peter Najarian of RW3 Ventures, and Edward Moncada of Protofund talk to Decrypt's Dan Roberts onstage at FTX's Crypto Bahamas event about VCs and family offices allocating money into crypto and the outlook for institutional DeFi.
articles.title: VCs and Family Offices Go Crypto: Hashed, Lux, Cleo, RW3 and Protofund at Crypto Bahamas

articles.description: Scott Hansen aka Tycho, the musician, producer, and songwriter, tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin how he caught the crypto bug and why he believes Web3 can change the music industry for the better.
articles.title: From Silk Road to Buying ETH: How Musician Tycho Went Crypto

articles.description: Decentralized Pictures, the nonprofit co-founded by Roman Coppola, is enabling on-chain voting to greenlight and fund film projects. CEO Leo Matchett tells Dan Roberts and Stephen Graves how the anti-crypto stigma in Hollywood is fading, how Web3 can bring more diversity to the film world and disrupt the traditional gatekeepers, and how he first got into crypto when he and Coppola set up a Bitcoin miner in an empty sound stage.
articles.title: gm: Decentralized Pictures CEO on How Web3 Can Change Hollywood

articles.description: In this video, we’ll learn about a core component that defines Web3: blockchain nodes. A node is one of the many computers that power a decentralized network like Ethereum. Learn about the different types of nodes and why they’re part of the core infrastructure that make Web3 possible. Visit Infura.io today to start building. Written by: Clarissa Watson, Senior Tech Writer at ConsenSys.
articles.title: Decrypt Learn: What Is a Node?
